title: Regulation of the fatty acid lipidome in ageing skin: a route towards novel anti-inflammatory products
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This project commenced on August 1st 2014. Our findings on existing methods and sensitivity of lipid analysis have been used by Unilever to establish a new method on site.
findingsText: We have developed methods that are sufficiently sensitive to characterise the regulation of the lipidome in skin cells. The future findings may support improved skin health care during ageing. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
